Container.Name: tinyMediaManager
Container.Description:
tinyMediaManager (http://www.tinymediamanager.org) is a media management tool written in Java/Swing.[br] It is written to provide metadata for the XBOX Media Center (XBMC).[br] Due to the fact that it is written in Java, tinyMediaManager will run on Windows, Linux and Mac OSX (and possible more OS).[br][br]
[b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : set this path to where you wish tinyMediaManager to store it's configuration.[br] [b]/mnt[/b] : set this path to where you wish tinyMediaManager to search for media.[br]
